channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Shiro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Shiro

item.title: CVE-2021-41303|2024-08-04T03:08:32.012Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20shiro
item.description: Apache Shiro before 1.8.0, when using Apache Shiro with Spring Boot, a specially crafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass. Users should update to Apache Shiro 1.8.0.
